exceptions.tactic: intros K V a u n m.
intros K' V a u n m.
intros K' V' a u n m.

exceptions.exn: The LHS of sum_n_m_mult_l (sum_n_m (fun k : nat => mult _ (_ k)) _ _) does not match any subterm of the goal

In environment K : Ring V : ModuleSpace K a : K u : nat -> V n, m : nat Unable to unify "scal ?M2435 (scal ?M2436 ?M2437) = scal (mult ?M2435 ?M2436) ?M2437" with "iter_nat plus zero (fun k : nat => scal a (u k)) n m = scal a (iter_nat plus zero u n m)".

original: intros K V a u n m. unfold sum_n_m. rewrite sum_n_m_mult_l. apply scal_assoc.
